ModMetaData.name: [Fuu] Punch Attack
ModMetaData.author: Fuu Chan
ModMetaData.description:
An unarmed prisoner is escaping! Quick, slice their limbs off with a plasmasword!
I'm sure we all wished we could order colonists to simply punch without unequipping them (or can't even unequip if they have implanted weapons). So here's a punch button!
Primary Changes Adds a punch attack button that appears while colonists are drafted, which functions the same as melee attack, but uses only unarmed attacks (won't use implant weapons either!)
*Optimized for performance. *Safe to add mid-game. *Safe to remove mid-game, but make sure no colonists are in the middle of a punch attack. *Leaves no permanent changes to your saved-game. *CE compatible. *No known conflicts.
Github Link: https://github.com/tenguin/Rimworld_PunchAttack
Credits to: sakino_shingetu, Inugami Korone, and Princess Connect: ReDive for the art sources used in the thumbnail and tanosii_chan for the upvote animation! Give them a visit!
